bundle.shortDescription: Network Reconnaissance and Data Exfiltration Assessment Platform
bundle.longDescription: WRAITH Recon is an authorized security testing platform for network reconnaissance and data exfiltration assessment. It includes safety controls such as Rules of Engagement enforcement, target whitelisting, time-bounded execution, kill switch mechanism, and tamper-evident audit logging.
